immobilien.title: Immobilien Form
immobilien.consent: By providing your data, you agree to its use for the following purposes: responding to your inquiries, providing information about properties, and sending you newsletters. You have the right to withdraw your consent at any time. You also have the right to access, rectify, erase, and port your data. By signing below, I give my consent to the use of my data as described above.

privateHealthInsurance.consent: I hereby consent to the collection, use, and sharing of my personal data with health insurance companies for the purposes of managing my health insurance policy, including billing, claims processing, and providing information about my policy. This data may include my name, address, date of birth, medical history, and other relevant information. I understand that my data may be shared with doctors, hospitals, pharmacies, and other service providers as necessary to process my claims and provide me with services. I also understand that I have the right to revoke my consent at any time. I am aware that revoking my consent may affect my ability to receive certain services. I have read and understand this consent form and agree to its terms.

stateHealthInsurance.consent: I consent to the processing of my personal data by state health insurance providers for the purpose of evaluating insurance eligibility, processing claims, and administering benefits. My information may be shared with healthcare providers, government agencies, and other entities as required by law. I understand that I have the right to access, correct, or delete my personal data, and that I can withdraw this consent at any time, though this may affect the services I receive. I confirm that all information provided is accurate and complete.

kfz.consent: I hereby authorize the collection and processing of my personal and vehicle data for the purpose of obtaining auto insurance quotes and policies. This includes my contact information, driving history, vehicle details, and payment information. I understand this data may be shared with insurance companies, claims adjusters, and repair services when necessary. I acknowledge that I can withdraw this consent at any time, though this may affect services related to my insurance policy. I confirm that the information provided is truthful and accurate.

loans.consent: I authorize the collection, use, and disclosure of my financial and personal information for the purpose of assessing my loan application, determining creditworthiness, and administering any resulting loan agreement. This includes checking my credit history, verifying employment, and sharing information with relevant financial institutions. I understand that my data will be retained as required by law and that I have the right to access, correct, and request deletion of my information. I acknowledge that refusing consent may result in my loan application not being processed.

electricity.consent: I authorize the collection and processing of my personal data, including contact information, payment details, and energy consumption patterns for the purpose of electricity supply services. This data may be used for billing, service improvement, and regulatory compliance. I understand that my information may be shared with grid operators, payment processors, and regulatory authorities when necessary. I acknowledge my right to access, correct, and request deletion of my personal data, and I understand that I can withdraw this consent, though this may affect the services I receive.

sanuspay.consent: I consent to SanusPay processing my personal and payment information for health payment services, including facilitating payments to healthcare providers, processing claims, and managing my health payment account. My information may be shared with healthcare providers, insurance companies, and payment processors as necessary to provide these services. I understand that I have the right to access, correct, or delete my personal data at any time, and that I can withdraw this consent, though this may affect my ability to use the service. I confirm all information provided is accurate.

gems.consent: I authorize the collection and processing of my personal data for investment in gemstones and precious metals, including contact information, investment preferences, and payment details. This information may be used to process purchases, maintain records of investments, and provide updates on market conditions. I understand my data may be shared with custodians, dealers, and regulatory authorities as required. I acknowledge my right to access, correct, and request deletion of my data, and I understand I can withdraw this consent at any time, though this may affect investment services provided to me.
